name.en: Ministry of Interior National NGO Registrar

description.en:
The Ministry of Interior is responsible for registering national non-governmental organizations (NGOs), as well as monitoring the proper implementation of its laws and regulations [1]. There are two distinct types of NGOs in Cambodia, national and foreign [2]. Only national NGOs are registered with the Ministry of Interior [2].
[1] https://www.interior.gov.kh/about
[2] https://cambodiacounsel.com/ngo-registration/

access.guidanceOnLocatingIds: Ask the organisation you wish to identify to provide their registration number.
